description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.0JZU0FVnvAJ08fVR]{Paradigm Shift}

Your obscuring magic doesn’t just thwart enemy sensors; it can overload them. When you succeed at a Mysticism check to perform the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.starship-actions.Item.OTWPk0lEeOwebAD3]{Mystic Haze} magic officerCOM crew action, you create an especially vexing countermeasure that lasts until the end of the next round. Whenever an opposing science officer performs the scan or lock on crew action against your starship and either fails the check by 5 or more or rolls a natural 1 on the Computers check, your magic scrambles the starship’s sensors system as if it had been hit by an EMP weapon.
